sec.title: Grants
sec.p: Joseph Cheng, prof., Illinois at Urbana‐Champaign; Oct. 2002; $355,000; U.S. Department of Education; for international business education and research.

Cassandra Cole, asst. prof., Florida State; July 2002–June 2003; $4,000; Florida State University Committee for Black Faculty and Student Support; to examine the effect of insider ownership on pension funding levels.
Dean H. Gatzlaff, prof., Florida State; Apr. 2002; $9,600; Real Estate Institute; to conduct a study of determinants of investment property transactions.

Dean H. Gatzlaff, prof., real estate, Florida State; Feb. 2002; $10,000; Lincoln Institute for Land Policy, Washington, D.C.; to examine the effect of Florida's “Save Our Home” constitutional amendment on property tax incidence.
